data.text: I've lost count of how many guys both in real life and online have put me down because I play video games or D&D, read fantasy books, whatever. Its like they feel like I'm encroaching on "their" territory or some idiocy. Man this topic just straight up pisses me off. Sorry all.

Like literally the only reason people believe this bullcrap of video games being only for males or consisting of males is due to its original marketing. The companies decided that males would be easier to market too. That's not the case anymore and even if it was, doesn't stop us
